recipes.name: Beef Burger
recipes.desc: A burger, short for hamburger, is a popular and iconic food item that consists of a cooked patty of ground meat (typically beef) placed between two slices of a bun. The patty is usually seasoned with various spices and grilled, fried, or cooked on a griddle.

recipes.name: Mutton
recipes.desc: Mutton is known for its distinctive flavor, which can vary depending on factors such as the breed of sheep, the animal's diet, and the cooking method employed. The meat tends to be rich, flavorful, and slightly gamey. It has a darker color and a stronger flavor compared to lamb.

recipes.name: Pasta
recipes.desc: Pasta is a type of Italian cuisine that has gained immense popularity worldwide. It is a staple food made from unleavened dough consisting of wheat flour, water, and sometimes eggs. The dough is typically shaped into various forms, such as long noodles, short tubes, or flat sheets, and then cooked by boiling in water.

recipes.name: Broccli Chicken
recipes.desc: This delicious chicken and broccoli casserole recipe is a twist on chicken divan that came from an old boss. It’s quick, satisfying comfort food.

recipes.name: Chicken Paprikash
recipes.desc: My mom learned to make this Hungarian chicken paprikash when she volunteered to help prepare the dinners served at her church.

recipes.name: Turkey Shepherd Pie
recipes.desc: We live way out in the county, and the nearest grocery store is 25 miles away. So I’ve become quite skilled at turning leftovers into second-time-around successes like this turkey shepherds pie

recipes.name: Tender Salsa Beef
recipes.desc: This is my Mexican-style twist on comfort food. To keep it kid-friendly, use mild salsa.

recipes.name: Roast Chicken
recipes.desc: This recipe proves that comfort food doesn't have to be full of unwanted calories. Mixed with orange and lemon juice, my roast chicken is both flavorful and healthy.

recipes.name: Fried Chicken
recipes.desc: Crispy, juicy and perfectly seasoned, this really is the best fried chicken recipe, ever. Summer reunions and neighborly gatherings will never be the same. When I was growing up, my parents had a farm, and every year, Dad would hire teenage boys to help by haying time.
